      This enum represents the skin types "Alex" and "Steve".

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public Mojang connect()

        Opens the connection with the Mojang API. Should always be called after creating the API object.

        Example: Mojang api = new Mojang().connect();

        Returns:
        the api itself. Useful for concatenation.

      • getStatus

        public Mojang.ServiceStatus getStatus(Mojang.ServiceType service)
        Retrieves the status of a portion of the API. Check the enum entries for Mojang.ServiceStatus for possible response types.
        Parameters:
        service - the service type
        Returns:
        the status of said service

      • getUUIDOfUsername

        public java.lang.String getUUIDOfUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Retrieves the current UUID linked to a username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        the UUID as a String

      • getUUIDOfUsername

        public java.lang.String getUUIDOfUsername(java.lang.String username,
                                          java.lang.String timestamp)
        Retrieves the UUID linked to a username at a certain moment in time.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        timestamp - the Java Timestamp that represents the time
        Returns:
        the UUID as a String

      • getNameHistoryOfPlayer

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getNameHistoryOfPlayer(java.lang.String uuid)
        Retrieves all the username a certain UUID has had in the past, including the current one.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID
        Returns:
        a map with the username as key value and the Timestamp as a Long

      • getPlayerProfile

        public PlayerProfile getPlayerProfile(java.lang.String uuid)
        Returns the PlayerProfile object which holds and represents the metadata for a certain account.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the PlayerProfile object}

      • updateSkin

        public void updateSkin(java.lang.String uuid,
                       java.lang.String token,
                       Mojang.SkinType skinType,
                       java.lang.String skinUrl)
        Updates the skin of a player using a URI. This means that the image file will not be uploaded to Mojang's servers, hence the API will need to query the given URI.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of said player
        token - the token used for API authentication
        skinType - the type of the skin
        skinUrl - a direct URL to the skin

      • updateAndUpload

        @Untested
public void updateAndUpload(java.lang.String uuid,
                                      java.lang.String token,
                                      Mojang.SkinType skinType,
                                      java.lang.String file)
        Updates the skin of a player using a URI. The raw skin data will be uploaded to Mojang's servers and stored there potentially forever.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of said player
        token - the token used for API authentication
        skinType - the type of the skin
        file - the raw image data

      • resetSkin

        public void resetSkin(java.lang.String uuid,
                      java.lang.String token)
        Resets the skin to the default.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the player
        token - the token used for API authentication

      • getServerBlacklist

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getServerBlacklist()

        Returns a list of blacklisted hostnames, belonging to servers that were blocked due to Mojang's EULA infringement.

        N.B.: These may not be in human friendly form as they were hashed. You may want to use third-party services to obtain an (unofficial) list.

        Returns:
        a List of all the blocked hostnames

      • getSaleStatistics

        @Untested
public SalesStats getSaleStatistics(SalesStats.Options... options)
        Returns the official mojang's product sales statistics.
        Parameters:
        options - the query options
        Returns:
        the stats
